summary.span: 驗證使用者認證，並管理使用者設定。

span.span: Validates user credentials and manages user settings.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別來驗證使用者認證和管理使用者設定，例如密碼和電子郵件地址時，會在 ASP.NET 應用程式。The class is used in ASP.NET applications to validate user credentials and manage user settings such as passwords and email addresses. 類別可用於本身，或搭配來建立完整的系統，來驗證 Web 應用程式或網站的使用者。The class can be used on its own, or in conjunction with the to create a complete system for authenticating users of a Web application or site. 控制項封裝類別提供方便的機制，來驗證使用者。The control encapsulates the class to provide a convenient mechanism for validating users. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 的成員資格功能，請參閱[成員資格簡介](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100))再繼續進行。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980(v=vs.100)) before continuing. 如需成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用的成員資格管理使用者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 類別提供的功能：The class provides facilities for: - 建立新的使用者。Creating new users. - Microsoft SQL Server 中或替代資料存放區中，請儲存 （使用者名稱、 密碼、 電子郵件地址和支援的資料） 的成員資格資訊。Storing membership information (user names, passwords, email addresses, and supporting data) in Microsoft SQL Server or in an alternative data store. - 瀏覽您的站台的驗證使用者。Authenticating users who visit your site. 您可以驗證使用者，以程式設計的方式，或者您可以使用控制項來建立需要少量或沒有程式碼的完整驗證系統。You can authenticate users programmatically, or you can use the control to create a complete authentication system that requires little or no code. - 管理密碼，其中包括建立、 變更、 擷取及重設，依此類推。Managing passwords, which includes creating, changing, retrieving, and resetting them, and so on. 您可以選擇性地設定為需要的密碼問題和解答，以驗證已忘記其密碼的使用者的密碼重設或擷取要求的 ASP.NET 成員資格。You can optionally configure ASP.NET membership to require a password question and answer to authenticate password reset or retrieval requests for users that have forgotten their password. 雖然 ASP.NET 成員資格是獨立的功能，在 ASP.NET 的驗證，但它可以與 ASP.NET 角色管理，以提供您網站的授權服務整合。Although ASP.NET membership is a self-standing feature in ASP.NET For authentication, it can be integrated with ASP.NET role management to provide authorization services for your site. 成員資格也可與 ASP.NET 使用者整合可以量身訂做的特定應用程式的自訂提供給個別使用者。Membership can also be integrated with the ASP.NET user to provide application-specific customization that can be tailored to individual users. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 認識角色管理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6)並[ASP.NET 設定檔屬性概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d)。For details, see [Understanding Role Management](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0d2f19d-a2a7-496d-88b6-30133f8ea3d6) and [ASP.NET Profile Properties Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/89439440-92ea-48c3-a4bd-dea40307899d). 類別必須仰賴通訊與資料來源的成員資格提供者。The class relies on membership providers to communicate with a data source. .NET Framework 包含，這會將使用者資訊儲存在 Microsoft SQL Server 資料庫中，和，可讓您在 Active Directory 或 Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) 的伺服器上儲存使用者資訊。The .NET Framework includes a , which stores user information in a Microsoft SQL Server database, and an , which enables you to store user information on an Active Directory or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server. 您也可以實作自訂的成員資格提供者與可用的替代資料來源通訊類別。You can also implement a custom membership provider to communicate with an alternative data source that can be used by the class. 自訂成員資格提供者繼承抽象類別。Custom membership providers inherit the abstract class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 實作成員資格提供者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8658b8e-c962-4f64-95e1-4acce35e4582)。For more information, see [Implementing a Membership Provider](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8658b8e-c962-4f64-95e1-4acce35e4582). 根據預設，所有的 ASP.NET 應用程式啟用 ASP.NET 成員資格。By default, ASP.NET membership is enabled for all ASP.NET applications. 預設成員資格提供者名稱的機器組態中指定`AspNetSqlProvider`。The default membership provider is the and is specified in the machine configuration with the name `AspNetSqlProvider`. 預設執行個體設定為連線到 Microsoft SQL Server 的本機執行個體。The default instance of the is configured to connect to a local instance of Microsoft SQL Server. 您可以修改預設設定，來指定以外的其他`AspNetSqlProvider`執行個體標示為預設的提供者，或指定您的 ASP.NET 應用程式，使用 Web.config 檔的預設提供者的自訂提供者執行個體。You can modify the default settings to specify a other than the `AspNetSqlProvider` instance as the default provider, or specify an instance of a custom provider as the default provider for your ASP.NET application using the Web.config file. 您可以指定 ASP.NET 成員資格設定 Web.config 檔案中使用的組態區段的 Web 應用程式。You can specify the ASP.NET membership configuration for your Web application using the configuration section in the Web.config file. 您可以使用`providers`子區段的區段，以指定的成員資格提供者不是預設的提供者。You can use the `providers` subsection of the section to specify a membership provider other than one of the default providers. 比方說下, 一節從目前的應用程式組態中移除預設的成員資格提供者，並加入新的提供者名稱為`SqlProvider`連接至名為 SQL Server 執行個體`AspSqlServer`。For example, the following section removes the default membership providers from the current application configuration and adds a new provider with a name of `SqlProvider` that connects to a SQL Server instance named `AspSqlServer`. ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示設定為使用表單驗證和 ASP.NET 成員資格的 ASP.NET 應用程式的登入頁面。The following code example shows the login page for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. 如果提供的使用者認證無效，則會向使用者顯示的訊息。If the supplied user credentials are invalid, a message is displayed to the user. 否則，使用者重新導向至原來要求的 URL 使用方法。Otherwise, the user is redirected to the originally requested URL using the method. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 登入控制項 (， ， ， ，和) 封裝幾乎所有提示使用者提供認證和驗證認證中的成員資格系統所需的邏輯，而且可以是用來取代以程式設計方式檢查使用類別。The ASP.NET login controls (, , , , and ) encapsulate virtually all of the logic required to prompt users for credentials and validate the credentials in the membership system and can be used in place of programmatic checking using the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來識別應用程式特定的使用者。The is used to identify users specific to an application. 也就是相同的使用者名稱可以存在於多個 ASP.NET 應用程式指定不同資料庫。That is, the same user name can exist in the database for multiple ASP.NET applications that specify a different . 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料庫來儲存使用者資訊而不會遇到重複的使用者名稱衝突。This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into duplicate user name conflicts. 或者，多個 ASP.NET 應用程式時，可以藉由指定相同使用相同的使用者資料庫。Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same . 可以在 Web 應用程式的組態中設定以程式設計方式或以宣告方式。The can be set programmatically or declaratively in the configuration for the Web application. > [!CAUTION] > 因為單一的預設成員資格提供者執行個體用來提供所要求的所有物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定屬性值。Because a single default membership provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入與變更屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。The property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 我們建議您避免撰寫程式碼，可讓使用者設定屬性，除非必要，否則。We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the property, unless you must. 應用程式的範例設定屬性可能需要管理多個應用程式的成員資格資料的系統管理應用程式。An example of an application where setting the property may be required is an administrative application that manages membership data for multiple applications. 這類應用程式應該是單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用執行個體和集合至`MyApplication`。It specifies that the application use a instance and sets the to `MyApplication`. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將新的使用者加入至資料存放區，並傳回新建立的使用者物件。 adds a new user to the data store and returns a object for the newly created user. 如果使用者建立失敗，就會擲回。If the user creation fails, a is thrown. 您可以擷取值從屬性，指出使用者建立失敗的原因。You can retrieve a value from the property of the that indicates why user creation failed. 當已建立成員資格使用者，而且您有參考物件為該使用者，您可以修改該使用者的設定與公用方法，例如應用程式的其中是`true`，或藉由設定的屬性值物件，並將其傳遞至方法。Once a membership user has been created and you have a reference to a object for that user, you can modify the settings for that user with the public methods, such as for applications where is `true`, or by setting the property values of the object and passing them to the method. 如果使用者已存在於應用程式的資料來源，您可以取得與現有的使用者物件方法。If a user already exists in the data source for the application, you can obtain a object for the existing user with the method. 提供選項，以針對每個使用者需要唯一的電子郵件地址。The provides an option to require a unique email address for each user. 如果屬性是`true`，您必須使用其中一種多載，可讓您指定要建立的使用者電子郵件地址。If the property is `true`, you will need to use one of the overloads that allows you to specify an email address for the user being created. 否則，就會擲回。Otherwise, a will be thrown. 中所有參數值的開頭和尾端空白會被去除。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的使用者，ASP.NET 應用程式設定為使用表單驗證和 ASP.NET 成員資格。The following code example creates a new user for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and ASP.NET membership. 如果未成功建立使用者，就是向使用者顯示訊息。If the user is not created successfully, a message is displayed to the user. 否則，將使用者重新導向的應用程式的登入頁面。Otherwise, the user is redirected to the login page for the application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 將新的使用者加入至資料存放區，並傳回新建立的使用者物件。 adds a new user to the data store and returns a object for the newly created user. 如果使用者建立失敗，您可以擷取值從`status`輸出參數，指出使用者建立失敗的原因。If the user creation fails, you can retrieve a value from the `status` output parameter that indicates why user creation failed. 方法會傳回`null`如果`password`為空字串或`null`，`username`為空字串或`null`，或包含逗號 （，）、`passwordQuestion`不`null`並為空字串，或`passwordAnswer`不是`null`和包含空字串。The method will return `null` if `password` is an empty string or `null`, `username` is an empty string or `null` or contains a comma (,), `passwordQuestion` is not `null` and is an empty string, or `passwordAnswer` is not `null` and contains an empty string. 當已建立成員資格使用者，而且您有參考物件為該使用者，您可以修改該使用者的設定與的公用方法和設定的屬性值物件，然後再將傳遞物件至方法。Once a membership user has been created and you have a reference to a object for that user, you can modify the settings for that user with the public methods and by setting the property values of the object and then passing the object to the method. 如果使用者已存在於應用程式的資料來源，您可以取得與現有的使用者物件方法。If a user already exists in the data source for the application, you can obtain a object for the existing user with the method. 開頭和尾端空白會刪減所有字串參數值。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all string parameter values. ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 密碼重設值來取代目前的使用者名稱密碼與新，隨機產生的密碼，當使用者忘記其密碼，或目前的密碼已不再有效的 ASP.NET 成員資格的能力。Password reset is the ability for ASP.NET membership to replace the current password for a user name with a new, randomly generated password when a user has forgotten their password or the current password is no longer valid. 這是特別有用，當密碼格式設定為，因為使用者無法擷取雜湊的密碼值。This is especially useful when password format is set to , as users cannot retrieve hashed password values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體並啟用密碼重設。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and enables password reset. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例會先確認所是`true`，然後重設使用者的密碼，並傳回新的、 自動產生密碼。The following code example first verifies that is `true`, then resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/ResetPasswordcs.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/ResetPasswordvb.aspx#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已`false`，基礎的成員資格提供者可能會擲回。If is `false`, the underlying membership provider may throw a . 隨附於.NET Framework 提供者支援增強的密碼安全性的多個密碼格式。The providers that are included with the .NET Framework support multiple password formats to enhance password security. 如果密碼格式設定為，則使用者將無法從資料庫擷取其現有的密碼。If the password format is set to , then users will not be able to retrieve their existing password from the database. 密碼格式提供單向密碼值的編碼方式。The password format provides one-way encoding of password values. 密碼是 「 雜湊 」，且相較於儲存在資料庫中進行驗證的值。Passwords are "hashed" and compared to values stored in the database for authentication. 「 雜湊 」 的值無法擷取原始的密碼值未編碼。"Hashed" values cannot be un-encoded to retrieve the original password value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體並啟用密碼擷取。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and enables password retrieval. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例會先確認所是`true`，然後擷取指定的使用者名稱的密碼，並將它傳送至電子郵件地址中，為指定的使用者。The following code example first verifies that is `true`, then retrieves the password for a specified user name and sends it to the email address for the specified user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 適用於需要高的安全性層級的網站，不建議使用電子郵件以純文字傳回密碼。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 高安全性的網站，我們建議您傳回使用加密，例如 SSL 密碼。For high-security sites, we recommend that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > > 此範例包含文字方塊中，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來產生隨機密碼，並最常由使用者密碼重設新的暫時密碼的成員資格提供者所實作的方法。The method is used to generate a random password and is most commonly used by the method implemented by a membership provider to reset the password for a user to a new, temporary password. 產生的密碼只能包含英數字元及下列標點符號： `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`。The generated password only contains alphanumeric characters and the following punctuation marks: `!@#$%^&*()_-+=[{]};:<>|./?`. 沒有隱藏或非可列印的控制字元會包含在產生的密碼。No hidden or non-printable control characters are included in the generated password. > [!NOTE] > 藉由建立隨機密碼方法不保證傳遞中的規則運算式屬性。The random password created by the method is not guaranteed to pass the regular expression in the property. 不過，隨機的密碼將會符合所建立的準則屬性和`numberOfNonAlphanumericCharacters`參數。However, the random password will meet the criteria established by the property and the `numberOfNonAlphanumericCharacters` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的成員資格使用者，並使用方法來初始化新的使用者設為隨機的值，顯示給使用者的密碼。The following code example creates a new membership user and uses the method to initialize the password for the new user to a random value, which is displayed to the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來擷取在使用者不知道他們的使用者名稱，但要怎麼知道電子郵件地址的情況下的成員資格使用者的使用者名稱。 can be used to retrieve the user name for a membership user in the case where a user does not know their user name, but does know their email address. 如果資料存放區中的多個使用者具有相同的電子郵件地址，則會傳回第一個遇到的使用者名稱。If more than one user in the data store has the same email address, the first user name encountered is returned. 中所有參數值的開頭和尾端空白會被去除。Leading and trailing spaces are trimmed from all parameter values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會擷取指定的電子郵件地址的使用者名稱。The following code example retrieves the user name for a specified email address. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). summary.span: 演算法的識別項，用於雜湊密碼。

span.span: The identifier of the algorithm used to hash passwords.

value.span: 演算法的識別項，用於雜湊密碼或空白，以使用預設雜湊演算法。

span.span: The identifier of the algorithm used to hash passwords, or blank to use the default hash algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別所使用之自訂的雜湊演算法類別。The property identifies the custom hash algorithm used by the class. 您設定屬性使用`hashAlgorithmType`項目的屬性。You set the property using the `hashAlgorithmType` attribute of the element. .NET Framework 可讓您設定自訂的密碼編譯類別使用的項目組態區段。The .NET Framework enables you to configure custom cryptography classes using the element configuration section. 屬性必須符合`name`項目中項目的屬性。The property must match the `name` attribute of the element in a element. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 將演算法名稱對應至密碼編譯類別](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md)。For more information, see [Mapping Algorithm Names to Cryptography Classes](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/map-algorithm-names-to-cryptography-classes.md). 如果未設定屬性，類別會使用設定的雜湊演算法`validation`項目的屬性。If the property is not set, the class uses the hash algorithm set in the `validation` attribute of the element.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts { get; }
.property int32 MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts
Public Shared ReadOnly Property MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts As Integer
public: static property int MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts { int get(); };
member this.MaxInvalidPasswordAttempts : int

summary.span: 取得鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數。

span.span: Gets the number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

value.span: 鎖定成員資格使用者以前，所允許的無效密碼或密碼解答嘗試次數。

span.span: The number of invalid password or password-answer attempts allowed before the membership user is locked out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配防範不必要的來源使用的屬性重複嘗試來猜測密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者。The property works in conjunction with the property to guard against an unwanted source using repeated attempts to guess the password or password answer of a membership user. 如果針對成員資格使用者是否大於或等於的值，輸入數目不正確的密碼或密碼解答屬性所指定之分鐘數內屬性，則使用者遭到鎖定網站設定屬性，以`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者方法。If the number of invalid passwords or password answers entered for a membership user is greater than or equal to the value of the property within the number of minutes specified by the property, then the user is locked out of the Web site by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果提供有效密碼或密碼解答的值之前屬性為止，追蹤無效嘗試次數的計數器就會設定為零。If a valid password or password answer is supplied before the value of the property is reached, the counter that tracks the number of invalid attempts is set to zero. 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試都會個別追蹤。Invalid password and password answer attempts are tracked separately. 例如，如果屬性設定為 5，使用者必須輸入正確的密碼，並最多五次嘗試輸入正確的密碼解答而遭鎖定的最多五次嘗試。For example, if the property is set to 5, the user has up to five attempts to enter a correct password and up to five attempts to enter a correct password answer without being locked out. 屬性值會設定在應用程式組態中使用`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`組態項目的屬性。The property value is set in the application configuration using the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute of the configuration element. 如果屬性是`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of an application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別，以提供成員資格服務和集合`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`屬性設定為五個的無效嘗試和`passwordAttemptWindow`30 分鐘的時間。It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

summary.span: 取得時間範圍，在此時間範圍內會追蹤提供有效密碼或密碼解答的連續失敗嘗試。

span.span: Gets the time window between which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answer are tracked.

value.span: 時間範圍 (以分鐘為單位)，在此時間範圍內會追蹤提供有效密碼或密碼解答的連續失敗嘗試。

span.span: The time window, in minutes, during which consecutive failed attempts to provide a valid password or password answer are tracked.
The default is 10 minutes.

value.span: 如果目前失敗嘗試與上一次失敗嘗試之間的時間間隔超過 屬性設定，則會將每次失敗嘗試都視為初次失敗嘗試。

span.span: If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, each failed attempt is treated as if it were the first failed attempt.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可搭配屬性，以協助您抵禦猜測密碼或密碼解答的成員資格使用者執行不必要的來源的重複嘗試。The property works in conjunction with the property to help guard against an unwanted source guessing the password or password answer of a membership user through repeated attempts. 當使用者嘗試登入時使用、 變更或重設其密碼時，只有特定數目的連續嘗試允許在指定的時間範圍內。When a user attempts to log in with, change, or reset his or her password, only a certain number of consecutive attempts are allowed within a specified time window. 此時間範圍長度指定為屬性，識別允許的無效嘗試之間的分鐘數。The length of this time window is specified in the property, which identifies the number of minutes allowed between invalid attempts. 如果連續失敗次數，可讓使用者重設他或她的密碼等於中儲存的值屬性，而時間後所經過的最後一個的無效嘗試小於中指定的分鐘數屬性，則成員資格使用者遭到鎖定。使用者已遭鎖定，藉由設定屬性，以`true`直到呼叫解除鎖定使用者方法。If the number of consecutive failed attempts that a user makes to reset his or her password equals the value stored in the property, and the time elapsed since the last invalid attempt is less than the number of minutes specified in the property, then the membership user is locked out. The user is locked out by setting the property to `true` until the user is unlocked by a call to the method. 如果目前失敗的嘗試和上一次失敗的嘗試之間的間隔大於屬性設定，則目前的無效嘗試會視為第一個。If the interval between the current failed attempt and the last failed attempt is greater than the property setting, the current invalid attempt is counted as the first. 如果達到允許的無效嘗試次數上限之前，提供有效的密碼解答，無效的密碼解答嘗試計數設為 0 （零）。If a valid password answer is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password-answer attempts is set to 0 (zero). 如果允許無效的最大數目之前提供有效的密碼嘗試次數達到時，不正確的密碼嘗試次數的計數和無效的密碼解答嘗試計數會設為 0 （零）。If a valid password is supplied before the maximum number of allowed invalid attempts is reached, the count of invalid password attempts and the count of invalid password-answer attempts are set to 0 (zero). 無效的密碼和密碼解答嘗試累積彼此。Invalid password and password-answer attempts accumulate independently of one another. 比方說，如果設定為 5，而且後面兩個不正確的密碼解答嘗試進行三次無效的密碼嘗試，內，則必須進行兩個多個無效的密碼嘗試次數 （或多個無效的密碼解答嘗試三） 成員資格使用者遭到鎖定。For example, if the is set to 5, and three invalid password attempts are made followed by two invalid password-answer attempts, two more invalid password attempts (or three more invalid password-answer attempts) must be made within for the membership user to be locked out. 應用程式組態中設定屬性值使用`passwordAttemptWindow`組態項目區段的屬性。The property value is set in the application configuration by using the `passwordAttemptWindow` attribute of the configuration-element section. 如果屬性設定為`false`，不會追蹤無效的密碼解答嘗試。If the property is set to `false`, invalid password-answer attempts are not tracked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體，並設定`maxInvalidPasswordAttempts`屬性設定為五個的無效嘗試和`passwordAttemptWindow`30 分鐘的時間。It specifies that the application use an instance of the and sets the `maxInvalidPasswordAttempts` attribute to five invalid attempts and the `passwordAttemptWindow` to 30 minutes. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性取得用來評估密碼複雜度，從提供者中所指定的規則運算式屬性。The property gets the regular expression used to evaluate password complexity from the provider specified in the property. 屬性會設定應用程式的組態使用`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`組態項目的屬性。The property is set in the application configuration using the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute of the configuration element. 如需有關規則運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 規則運算式](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md)。For more information about regular expressions, see [.NET Framework Regular Expressions](~/docs/standard/base-types/regular-expressions.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的組態項目`system.web`應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the configuration element in the `system.web` section of the application's Web.config file. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體類別，以提供成員資格服務和集`passwordStrengthRegularExpression`屬性來驗證密碼的規則運算式符合下列準則：It specifies that the application use an instance of the class to provide membership services, and sets the `passwordStrengthRegularExpression` attribute to a regular expression that validates the password meets the following criteria: - Is greater than 七個字元。Is greater than seven characters. - 包含至少一個數字。Contains at least one digit. - 包含至少一個特殊的 （非英數） 字元。Contains at least one special (non-alphanumeric) character. 如果密碼不符合這些準則，成員資格提供者不接受密碼。If the password does not meet these criteria, the password is not accepted by the membership provider. ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會參考所有啟用的應用程式的成員資格提供者，包括提供者加入應用程式的 Web.config 檔案和 Machine.config 檔案中的所有應用程式。The property references all of the membership providers enabled for an application, including providers added in the Web.config file for the application and the Machine.config file for all applications. 您可以控制其成員資格提供者是可讓您的應用程式使用`providers`中您的應用程式的組態區段的項目。You can control which membership providers are available for an application using the `providers` element of the section in the configuration for your application. 比方說，下列範例會顯示一節中移除的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案執行個體 (`AspNetSqlProvider`) 在電腦組態檔中指定，並將執行個體名為`SqlProvider`為應用程式的預設成員資格提供者。For example, the following sample shows the section in the Web.config file for an application that removes the instance (`AspNetSqlProvider`) specified in the machine configuration file and adds a instance named `SqlProvider` as the default membership provider for the application. ``` ``` 指定時[項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)區段中，您必須指定`defaultProvider`屬性。When specifying the [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) section, you must specify the `defaultProvider` attribute. 如果您未指定[項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述） 的成員資格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049)會使用您的 Web.config 中的機器組態的值中的區段和執行個體名為`AspNetSqlProvider`建立為`defaultProvider`.If you do not specify a [membership Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9c1ee8f-33ca-4361-8666-b42a0fe86049) section in your Web.config, the values from the machine configuration are used and the instance named `AspNetSqlProvider` is established as the `defaultProvider`. 您可以取得的提供者的強型別的參考集合中依名稱編製索引的成員資格提供者，並將它轉型為所需的類型。You can obtain a strongly typed reference to a provider from the collection by indexing the membership provider by name and casting it as the desired type. ## 不過，問題和答案不會使用。If and are both `false`, can still be used to enforce the creation of questions and answers when new users are created; however, the question and answer will not be used. 您可以使用擷取問題類別。You will be able to retrieve the question by using the class. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 與 。For more information, see and . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application. 它會指定應用程式使用的執行個體、 啟用密碼重設，以及執行重設時，需要有密碼解答。It specifies that the application use an instance of the , enables password reset, and requires a password answer when performing a reset. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例會檢查值，並將密碼問題和答案時建立使用者，提供必要的控制項。The following code sample checks the value of and adds the necessary controls for a password question and answer to be supplied when creating a user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含文字方塊中，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example includes a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供簡單的方法，以確認使用者名稱和密碼，從資料來源。 provides an easy way to verify a user name and password from the data source. 請注意，如果`username`參數是空的或是`null`、就會擲回。Note that, if the `username` parameter is empty or `null`, an is thrown. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示 ASP.NET 應用程式設定為使用表單驗證的登入頁面和類別。The following code example shows the login page for an ASP.NET application configured to use forms authentication and the class. 如果提供的使用者認證無效，則會向使用者顯示的訊息。If the supplied user credentials are invalid, a message is displayed to the user. 否則，使用者重新導向至原本要求的 URL，藉由方法。Otherwise, the user is redirected to the originally requested URL by the method. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此範例包含一個文字方塊，接受使用者輸入，也就是潛在的安全性威脅。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時方法，方法，或成員資格提供者方法的呼叫。The event is raised when the method, the method, or the method of a membership provider is called. 您可以使用事件，以便驗證密碼的格式和成員資格使用者的值。You can use the event to validate password formats and values for membership users. 您可以取消目前， ，或藉由設定動作提供的屬性來`true`期間事件。You can cancel the current , , or action by setting the property of the supplied to `true` during the event. 如果您藉由設定取消目前的動作屬性，以`true`，您可以設定提供的屬性例外狀況的描述密碼驗證失敗的原因。If you cancel the current action by setting the property to `true`, you can set the property of the supplied to an exception that describes the reason for the password-validation failure. 呼叫方法會擲回例外狀況，屬性設定為。The calling method will throw the exception that the property is set to. 如果屬性是`null`，呼叫端將會擲回泛型的密碼驗證失敗例外狀況。If the property is `null`, the caller will throw a generic password-validation-failure exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範所驗證的使用者密碼的格式，並取消動作，如果密碼不符合所需的格式的事件。The following code example shows a event that validates the format of the password for a user and cancels the action if the password does not match the required format.
